titles.title: Small Business Compliance Assistance Enhancement Act of 2007
A bill to enhance compliance assistance for small business.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S385-386)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S879-990)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5175-5176)

bill.summary:
1/10/2007--Introduced.
Small Business Compliance Assistance Enhancement Act of 2007 - Amends the Small Business Regulatory Enforcement Fairness Act of 1996 to require an agency to prepare a compliance guide to assist small entities in complying with a Federal rule or group of related rules for which an agency is required to prepare a final regulatory flexibility analysis whenever an agency determines that a Federal rule or group of rules will have a significant economic impact on a substantial number of small entities.
